ruffle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to make a smooth surface uneven
ruffle.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: A light wind ruffled the water.
ruffle.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to offend or upset someone slightly
ruffle.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Louise’s sharp comments had ruffled his pride.
ruffle.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a band of thin cloth sewn in folds as a decoration around the edge of something such as a collar
